subSubSection.paragraph:
1843
Nezara Amyot and Serville
, 143. Type species:
Cimex smaragdulus Fabricius, 1775
, a junior synonym of
Cimex viridula Linnaeus, 1758
. Designated by Kirkaldy, 1909a .
